mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ORDER( id, ord_code, cont_code, ord_address, cus_id, ord_status, delivery_date, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_ORDER( id, ord_code, cont_code, ord_address, cus_id, ord_status, delivery_date, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{tOrder.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tOrder.ordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOrder.contCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOrder.ordAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOrder.cusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tOrder.ordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tOrder.deliveryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOrder.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tOrder.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ORDER SET id = #{id}, ord_code = #{ordCode}, cont_code = #{contCode}, ord_address = #{ordAddress}, cus_id = #{cusId}, ord_status = #{ordStatus}, delivery_date = #{deliveryDate}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
